course.title: MAT 4170 Probability Theory I (3 units)
course.desc: Probability spaces, random variables, expected values as integrals, joint distributions, independence and product measures, cumulative distribution functions and extension of probability measures, Borel-Cantelli lemmas, convergence concepts, independent and identically distributed sequences of random variables.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 3120, MAT 3172.
